function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Inadequate understanding of the importance of ventilation","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Halted construction factors in promoting mental health and well-being","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on literature review and expert discussion may lead to biased or incomplete
